reviews.title: Amazing !!!!!!!!
reviews.text: We got back from the Sharm Bride on the 26th of April and some of us did'nt want to come home :( we all had a great holiday !!!

reviews.title: ENTERTAINMENT
reviews.text: When we arrived the hotel was very quiet and it did not get much busier during the 2 weeks we were there BUT we loved it that way.

reviews.title: Lovely hotel & great staff
reviews.text: The food is ok, we found something to eat the whole time, and a few of us are fussy eaters, the chef's will cook something different for you but you have to ask !!!

reviews.title: Amazing Holiday PLEASE Ignore Bad Reviews
reviews.text: All the staff at the Sharm Bride made our stay great they cannot do enough for you.

reviews.title: Great holiday at Sharm
reviews.text: The pool is clean and we never had a problem finding a sunbed.

reviews.title: met all the requirements of my chill out holiday.
reviews.text: just got back from my second visit to sharm bride.that in itself should say it all.well worth a return visit despite all the problems the area is facing with lack of tourists from other countries.fortunately the brits are still goingbut the hotels are trying hard to make good out of a sad situation..service ,cleanliness,rooms,staff and animation team all amazing.the selection of food was not as vast as my visit in october but no one had any need to go hungry...at the end of the day we all have to work to a budget...i wish everyone at the hotel my thanks for a most enjoyable time and i will be back in october when i hope normal service will have resumed.

reviews.title: Fantastic holiday
reviews.text: The hotel is lovely particularly the pool, everything is very clean and the staff are great they made our holiday!

reviews.title: Hotel Basic, the staff are brilliant!!
reviews.text: Mega, Aja, Mavoo, Shetos and Jimmy from the anaimation team are brilliant and loads of fun, they really took care of us!

reviews.title: couldn't be happier
reviews.text: Marina and Victor (the rep) also brilliant, really miss them all!

reviews.title: DO NOT GO TO THIS HOTEL.....!!!!!
reviews.text: When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by friendly staff who checked us in quickly and showed us to our room and explained when the meals at the restaurants were served.

reviews.title: Amazing loved every moment
reviews.text: Loved the hotel and the people. Without the staff and this beautiful resort my holiday wouldn't have been the same I went with my brother and we had the best time we could ever have. I didn't want to come back and everything was perfect from the room to the people and even the reception people. My love goes out to everyone at sharm bride hotel from London. It's ammmmmaaaazzzzzzziiinnnnggggg and I really really liked it!!

reviews.title: Great honeymoon
reviews.text: although the place is an up and coming area with many new hotels being built, and not too much to do in the area itself i must say we had a great honeymoon!

reviews.title: Best Holiday :)
reviews.text: The staff were fantastic, especially Adam and achmed( soory if spelt wrong) they were so friendly and couldnt do enough for us.

reviews.title: Fun Time At Sharm Bride
reviews.text: The entertainment.... well what can i say about Mavoo. Me ga and the guys...... ? they were great they never stopped entertaining all day and night!!

reviews.title: It's amazing, thats what im talking about.
reviews.text: The rooms were massive just one thing make sure you keep the room cold to stop bites!! they were spotless the cleaner was very polite.

reviews.title: The best holiday ever!!
reviews.text: I have visited Sharm Bride on two occasions now, the place met all my expectations and more! The hotel itself is clean, the pool is big and perfect for my daughter. It has water slides and two childrens pools. The most impressive thing about this place is the staff, always kind and helpful. The animation team work long hours day and night to provide entertainment. My daughter was whisked away each day for 3 hours to the

reviews.title: Amazing holiday
reviews.text: Kids club where Aja did a fantastic job at stimulating the kids. There was always activities to take part in such as water aerobics, bowls and darts. The food was good, they always had pasta available whic was great as that suited my daughter. The did traditional English food such as steak and chips! I have already booked my summer holiday to go back to Sharm Bride!!!!! :)

reviews.title: Good holiday- would come back
reviews.text: i have stayed in Sharm Bride and i can honestly say that it was amazing!!!!!!

reviews.title: Excellent Hotel & Staff
reviews.text: restaurant. the food is lovely, some days tipically egyptian, u can even find some kind of english food. u have a lot of drinks and the waiters

reviews.title: Excellent holiday
reviews.text: room. the room is fantastic, spasious and clean, the houskeeping do a great job with a lot of decorations
